name: ISS Strike
description:
ISS Strike is a spatial puzzle game where you are required to control the defense system of the Station. Unfortunately, the station has no weapons, so you'll have to reposition it in order to dodge the incoming asteroids. 
But be careful! The station grows its size in time!
Hopefully you can count in an advanced asteroid motion prediction system...

Use WASD or Left Joystick to rotate the Station.
